import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Nav, Navbar, Form, FormControl, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./AdminHome.css"; import history from "../history"; import postProductForm from "../Products/postProductForm"; // import Product from "../Product"; class AdminHome extends Component { state = { Products: [], isLoading: true, orders: 0, totalSales: 0, Categories: 0, }; async componentDidMount() { const response = await fetch("/products"); const body = await response.json(); const ordersResponse = await fetch("/carts/orders"); const ordersBody = await ordersResponse.json(); const totalSalesResponse = await fetch("/carts/totalSales"); const totalSalesBody = await totalSalesResponse.json(); const CategoriesResponse = await fetch("/categories"); const CategoriesBody = await CategoriesResponse.json(); this.setState({ Products: body, isLoading: false, orders: ordersBody.length, totalSales: totalSalesBody, Categories: CategoriesBody.length, }); // this.setState(productCount: ) } render() { const { Products, orders, totalSales, Categories } = this.state; return (
